issue.title: [CF 1317] Way to track amount of absorbs from Necrotic Strike?
issue.body:
ATTACHING A SAVED VARIABLES FILE/SCREENSHOT WILL GET YOUR TICKET ANSWERED MUCH FASTER

Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What is the issue?

Please provide any additional information below.

The icon and spell that i can currently track with TMW is 194310 which should be festering wound. I can track when i have festering wound on the target but i cant seem to find a way for it to show the amount of healing on the icon that is currently left to be absorbed. Its not a stack so it doesnt count stacks either. Idk if im just doing it wrong or if it is something you could do on your end. Any help is greatly appreciated and I love the addon <3
